description.en:
An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

title.en: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu

altTitles.ja: ゴミ以下だと追放された使用人、実は前世賢者です
ゴミ以下だと追放された使用人、実は前世賢者です　～　史上最強の賢者、世界最高峰の学園に通う

altTitles.ja-ro: Gomiikadato Tsuihousareta shiyounin, Jitsuha zense kenjya desu
Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu: Shijou Saikyou no Kenja, Sekai Saikou Hou no Gakuen ni Kayou

altTitles.en: The Servant Who Was Banished for Being Less Than Trash Is Actually a Sage in a Previous Life
The Servant Who Was Banished for Being Less Than Trash Is Actually a Sage in a Previous Life: The Most Powerful Sage in History Attends the World's Most Prestigious Academy

description.en:
One day, Gard, a servant of a count's family, was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.

"You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"

Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go, Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy, but Gard passed it with ease.

How could this happen to Gard, who was just a servant?!

Yes, in his previous life, Gard was actually the "strongest sage"!

The strongest sage is unrivaled! A thrilling reincarnation story!
description.ja:
伯爵家の使用人だったガルドは、ある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、「お前はゴミ以下だ！ すぐに家から出ていけ！」と、使用人を解雇されてしまう。

伯爵家から追放され、行く当てのないガルドは、レミリオン魔法学園の生徒募集チラシを目にし、王都で入学試験を受けることに。

最難関と言われる魔法学園の試験だったが、ガルドはその試験を軽々とパスしてしまう。

なぜ、単なる使用人だったガルドに、そんなことが――!?

そう、ガルドの前世は、なんと“最強の賢者”だったのだ！

最強賢者が無双する！ 痛快☆転生ストーリー!!

title.en: The Villainess Just Wants To Live In Peace!

description.en:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel.

I wanted to get rid of my death flag and live in peace, but apparently I’ve already been whipping and tormenting the final villain. I wasn't the one who did it, but since I still felt responsible for it, I’ve been taking care of him, and the villain's loyalty towards me keeps increasing.

I just want to enjoy my wealth and honor in peace.
I don't know why the story keeps going astray!

altTitles.pt-br: O casamento e a sua espada

altTitles.ja: マリッジ＆ソード～令嬢剣士の政略結婚～

description.ar:
بيت Targayel ، سيف الإمبراطور ومجد الإمبراطورية. بيت ترجايل ، واسمه محترم ، كان محكوما عليه بالفشل. لم يكونوا محكومين عليهم فقط ، لقد تم تدميرهم. فقط لتغطية نفقاتهم ، تخفي Elje هويتها وتذهب إلى الحرب. بعد عودتها إلى المنزل ، اعتقدت Elje التي صنعت لنفسها اسمًا من خلال مهارتها المذهلة في المبارزة واكتسبت ثروة أن كل ما عليها فعله هو أن تعيش حياة سعيدة. بشكل غير متوقع زواج سياسي رتب بأوامر الإمبراطور! كان شريكها شان كريكسوس ، نائب قائد الجيش الإمبراطوري ، الذي أنقذته في الحرب .......

---

description.en:
House Targael, the sword of the Emperor and the glory of the Empire. House Targael, whose name was respectable, was doomed. They weren’t just doomed, they were destroyed. Just to make ends meet, Elze hides her identity and goes to war. After returning home, Elze, who made a name for herself through her amazing swordsmanship and gained a fortune, thought that all she had to do was live a happy life. Unexpectedly, a political marriage was arranged by the Emperor’s orders! Her partner to be was Shan Kiraxus, deputy commander of the Imperial Army, whom she had saved in the war…

---
After my family fell on hard times, I, Hergenes Targael, disguised myself as a male mercenary named Herge to make money. Along the way, I rescued and met Shaun Kyroxus, a formidable ally who I abruptly left when I was needed back home. Sometime later, I am now part of an arranged marriage with none other than... Shaun?! He's dying to see Herge again, and it's only a matter of time before he finds out! I'm not sure if this marriage will work out, and what do I do when he finds out?!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.es:
La Casa Targael, la espada del Emperador y la gloria del Imperio. La Casa Targael, cuyo nombre era respetable, estaba condenada. No sólo estaban condenados, sino que fueron destruidos. Para poder subsistir, Elze oculta su identidad y va a la guerra. Tras regresar a casa, Elze, que se hizo un nombre gracias a su asombrosa habilidad con la espada y ganó una fortuna, pensó que lo único que tenía que hacer era vivir una vida feliz. Inesperadamente, ¡se concertó un matrimonio político por orden del Emperador! Su futura pareja era Shan Kiraxus, subcomandante del Ejército Imperial, a quien salvó en la guerra...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97866)
description.fr:
La famille Targayel est considéré comme l'épée de l'empereur et la gloire de l'empire. Cependant, la réputation du nom de la famille est détruite obligeant Elje à cacher son identité et à partir pour la guerre.

Elle rentre finalement chez elle après s'être fait un nom avec son incroyable maîtrise de l'épée et avoir gagné beaucoup d'argent, pensant qu'il n'y avait plus rien à faire pour être heureuse, une nouvelle lui tombe dessus comme un coup de tonnerre: un mariage arrangé! Avec nulle autre que Shan Kiraxus, le commandant adjoint de l'armée impériale, à qui Elje a sauvé la vie pendant la guerre...

---

description.ko:
황제의 검이자 제국의 영광, 타르가옐 가(家). 그러나 이름만 그럴듯한 타르가옐 백작가는 망했다. 그냥 망한 게 아니라, 쫄딱 망했다. 단지 먹고 살기 위해서, 엘제는 정체를 감추고 전쟁에 참전한다. 경이로운 검술로 이름을 날리고, 돈도 두둑하게 벌어서 집으로 돌아온 엘제는 이제 행복해질 일만 남았다고 생각했으나- 갑자기 날아든 날벼락 같은 소식, 황명으로 인한 정략결혼! 그 상대는 엘제가 전쟁에서 목숨을 구해줬던 제국군의 부사령관, 샨 키락서스인데...

---

description.pt:
Casa Targael, a espada do Imperador e a glória do Império. A Casa Targael, cujo nome era respeitável, estava condenada. Eles não estavam apenas condenados, eles foram destruídos. Para sobreviver, Elze esconde sua identidade e vai para a guerra. Depois de voltar para casa, Elze, que fez seu nome por meio de sua incrível habilidade com a espada e ganhou uma fortuna, pensou que tudo o que ela precisava fazer era viver uma vida feliz. Inesperadamente, um casamento político foi arranjado por ordem do imperador! Seu futuro parceiro era Shan Kiraxus, vice-comandante do Exército Imperial, que ela salvou na guerra.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.ru:
Дом Таргаэь, меч Императора и слава Империи. Дом Таргаэль, чье имя было респектабельным, был обречен. Они были не просто обречены, они были уничтожены. Просто чтобы свести концы с концами, Эргенес скрывает свою личность и отправляется на войну. Вернувшись домой, Эргенес, которая сделала себе имя благодаря своему удивительному мастерству фехтования и сколотила состояние, подумала, что все, что ей нужно было сделать, - это жить счастливой жизнью. Неожиданно по приказу императора был устроен политический брак! Ее будущим партнером был Шань Кираксус, заместитель командующего Имперской армией, которого она спасла во время войны...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.vi:
Nhà Targayel, thanh gươm của Hoàng đế và vinh quang của Đế chế.
Nhà Targayel, cái tên đáng kính, đã phải diệt vong. Họ không chỉ phải chịu đựng mà còn bị tiêu diệt.

Chỉ để kiếm sống, Elje che giấu danh tính của mình và tham gia chiến tranh.
Sau khi trở về nhà, Elje, người đã tạo dựng tên tuổi nhờ kiếm thuật tuyệt vời của mình và có được một tài sản kếch xù nghĩ rằng tất cả những gì cô ấy phải làm là sống một cuộc sống hạnh phúc.

Không ngờ, một cuộc hôn nhân chính trị đã được sắp đặt theo lệnh của Hoàng đế!
Đối tác của cô ấy là Shan Crixus, phó chỉ huy của Quân đội Đế quốc, người mà cô ấy đã cứu trong cuộc chiến…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.zh:
皇帝的剑，帝国的荣耀，塔尔加耶尔家。 但是名字像模像样的塔尔加耶尔伯爵家却完蛋了。 不是完了，而是非常彻底的完了。 为了维持生计，埃尔杰隐瞒了身份，参加了战争。 以惊人的剑术出名，赚了很多钱回到家的埃尔杰认为现在只剩下让自己幸福这件事了- 突如其来的晴天霹雳般的消息，皇命的政治婚姻！ 对方是埃尔杰在战争中救了他一命的帝国军的副司令官，沙恩·基拉克萨斯…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97866)
description.pt-br:
A espada do imperador e a glória do império, a família Targayel é famosa por seu gênio na esgrima, mas em algum momento, uma criança com talento para a esgrima não nasce, e a família Targayell naturalmente vai à beira da destruição. Mas Elje, a filha mais velha da família, disfarça-se de homem e participa na guerra para salvar a família. Quando ela volta para casa depois de fazer um nome para si mesma com sua incrível esgrima e ganhar muito dinheiro, pensava que só havia uma coisa a fazer para ser feliz. No entanto, o imperador diz para Elje se casar por acordo. Incapaz de desobedecer ao imperador, Elje decide se casar com ele, a Shan Kiraxus com quem ela lutou na guerra. O oponente é Shan Kiraxus, o vice-comandante do Exército Imperial, que ele escolheu, cuja vida salvou na guerra...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

皇帝的劍，帝國的榮耀，塔爾加耶爾家。但是名字像模像樣的塔爾加耶爾伯爵家卻完蛋了。

不是完了，而是非常徹底的完了。

為了維持生計，埃爾杰隱瞞了身份，參加了戰爭。

以驚人的劍術出名，賺了很多錢回到家的埃爾杰認為現在只剩下讓自己幸福這件事了

突如其來的晴天霹靂般的消息，皇命的政治婚姻！

對方是埃爾杰在戰爭中救了他一命的帝國軍的副司令官，沙恩·基拉克薩斯…

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

He is a sunny, hilarious, positive and obscure actor. He is a composed generous and graceful general manager. Because of a strange request, they began a long journey of attracting each other. What should they do? Nonsense, of course becoming lovers.

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

description.en:
The protagonist fell asleep while playing an online game. However, he awoke in a strange world with his game character's appearance. In a state of shock, he noticed that he was equipped with nothing but his strongest weapon and armor. To make matters worse, our hero's appearance was changed by the special avatar skin『Skeleton』when he enter this new world. The protagonist wanted to live without drawing attention, but he got acquainted with the dark elf Ariana and received her request.  
  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/skeleton-knight-in-another-world-light-novel/)
description.uk: Одного разу головний герой грав у відеогру, поки він не заснув...й коли він прокинувся, опинився в ігровому світі в образі свого аватара, як скелет! Оснащений потужною зброєю та обладунками аватара, але застрягши у страхітливій зовнішності, Арк повинен знайти місце для себе в цьому дивовижному світі. Усі його сподівання на тихе життя розвіюються, коли він зустрічається з прекрасною ельфійкою воїном, після чого вони разом подорожують цим світом.
description.pt-br:
Arc, um jovem jogador, desmaia durante uma partida online e quando desperta se depara em um mundo estranho, muito semelhante ao do jogo. Chocado com o ocorrido, ele percebe que está neste mundo munido de uma armadura e uma poderosa arma, além de poderes e aparência modificada para a de um [Caveiro]. Arc precisa se manter vivo e, para isso, não deve chamar a atenção. Porém, ele acaba encontrando uma elfa chamada Ariana e aceitando o seu pedido.

description.en:
Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

altTitles.en: If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love
Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.

Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

description.en:
"I want to break up with you." 

In the winter of his first year of high school. Yuta Miyamoto, who tries to be "kind to others," was told by his girlfriend, Yumi Asakawa, that she had to break up with him. While he is still recovering from his broken heart, Akane Kurosaki, a junior, calls him "unable to get a girlfriend," and Ruriri, his favorite maid, calls him "like a slave". Yuta, fed up with the situation, declares his intention to break off relations with all three, but the reaction is not what he expected!

In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.

description.en:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
description.fr: Élisia Creed est de retour dans son corps de 10 ans."Mais pourquoi à ce moment précis ?"La personne qui l'a sauvée, qui était presque la proie des chiens sauvages dans la forêt de minuit, est le duc Balne, le protagoniste de toutes sortes de rumeurs dangereuses.Elle a vécue 29 vies dans le malheur à cause de sa belle-mère, qui cherche désespérément à la tuer, et de son père froid et négligent. C'était la dernière chance que Dieu lui a donnée. Avec l'aide du duc, Élysia change son destin.
description.zh:
重生30次遇见危险公爵
这次要亲手改变不幸的命运
艾莉希雅·克雷德回来了！再一次回到了自己儿时的身体里。这倒不是坏事，可为什么偏偏回到了这个时间点啊？在午夜的森林里，有着各种危险传闻的瓦尔恩公爵，救了差点被一群野狗撕咬的她。因为绞尽脑汁想要夺走她的性命的继母，和对此冷眼旁观、放任不管的父亲，艾莉希雅过了29次悲惨的人生。这是神给予她的最后一次机会，这一次艾莉希雅在公爵的帮助之下，开始了改写自己命运的故事！

description.en:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

description.en:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
description.pt-br:
Depois de completar 30 anos como NEET, Kyousuke foi expulso da casa de seus pais.
Foi então que Rui, o seu melhor amigo, propôs uma solução: casar e depois divorciar-se!

Um rapaz e uma moça que são “apenas amigos” há cerca de uma década decidem entrar em um casamento de mentira.
Ele é um romântico e ela é apenas uma garota pragmática. Um casal inadequado para o casamento.
O que eles descobrirão depois de 100 dias juntos?

“Please be my friend.” Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana…
Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love?
A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

description.fr: Le prochain directeur de l'hôtel Woo Myung-sung a été élevé comme "œuvre d'art" par son père. Myong-sung, qui semblait parfait sous tous les aspects, était en fait en train de perdre sa motivation à vivre, épuisé par la pression qu'il avait endurée depuis son enfance. Puis un jour, Woo Myung-sung a rencontré un camarade du lycée qui distribuait du poulet. Je veux transmettre mes compétences en rendez-vous à Jeonsu, qui se réveille comme une poupée qu'il aime, change d'humeur et révèle honnêtement toutes ses émotions comme un idiot. "Essaye, embrasse, apprends."

description.ja:
いたって普通の少年、日向祥太。そんな彼は専属のメイドさん・黒椿亜梨沙と一緒に暮らしていた。
容姿端麗、頭脳明晰、何をやらせても完璧な彼だけの女の子。しかし彼女、絶対零度の無表情なうえに、祥太をことあるごとにからかいまくって、ちょっとエッチなご奉仕もしようとする謎多きメイドさんだった!!
亜梨沙に恋心を抱く祥太は、彼女にふさわしくなるために、どうにか男らしさを保とうとするが…果たして、肉食系Ｓメイドを祥太は止められるのか!!?

セクシー系漫画界の風来坊、7zu7の人気同人誌「ボクんちのメイドさんたち。」を一般誌化!!
背伸びしたい系男子が無表情メイドに迫られまくる、理性蒸発ラブコメ!!!!!

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

---

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

description.zh-hk:
世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

title.en: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai shite Iru

altTitles.ja: 楠木さんは高校デビューに失敗している

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai shite Iru

altTitles.zh: 楠木同学高中出道失败了

altTitles.en: Kusunoki-san Failed to Debut in High School
She Is (Not) a Cool Girl (in High School)
Kusunoki-san Failed Her High School Debut

altTitles.ru: Кусуноки-сан не смогла измениться к старшей школе

altTitles.zh-ro: Nánmù tóngxué gāo zhòng chūdào shībàile

description.en: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
description.ja:
中学時代のトラウマをきっかけに高校デビューに成功した元陰キャの志月恵助。
新しい環境で過去の自分を知る者はいない。ただ一人、同じ中学出身で
恵助と同様に高校デビューを果たした女子・楠木静を除いて…。

---
Chūgaku jidai no torauma o kikkake ni kōkō debyū ni seikō shita moto in kya no shitsuki keisuke. Atarashī kankyō de kako no jibun o shiru mono wa inai. Tadahitori, onaji chūgaku shusshin de keisuke to dōyō ni kōkō debyū o hatashita joshi Kusunoki Shizuka o nozoite….
description.pt-br: Depois de seus anos traumáticos no ensino médio, o ultra-introvertido Shizuki Keisuke decide mudar sua vida e se transforma completamente para sua "estreia" no ensino médio. Sua nova vida escolar parece promissora, já que ninguém sabe de seu passado oculto... exceto por uma pessoa: Kusunoki Shizuka, que também mudou a si mesma em busca de uma vida escolar mais bem-sucedida! À medida que seus destinos se entrelaçam, Keisuke será capaz de viver uma vida pacífica no ensino médio...?!

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

title.en: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck

description.en: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
description.zh: 重生后的赵明溪为了避开绝症活下去，不得不去蹭傅氏太子爷身上的气运。 这位太子爷每次看到她，明明耳朵快红得滴血，还要装出酷炫狂霸拽的样子：“你能不能别缠我？” 第二天赵明溪就真的去找别人蹭气运了。:) 小狼狗头低了下来，委委屈屈：“给你缠还不行吗？”

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.en: When I Returned to My Hometown, My Childhood Friend was Broken

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimoto ni Kaettekitara Osananajimi ga Kowareteta

altTitles.ja: 地元に帰ってきたら幼馴染が壊れてた

altTitles.pt-br: Quando voltei pra minha cidade natal, minha amiga de infância estava falida
Quando voltei pra minha cidade natal, minha amiga de infância estava quebrada

altTitles.tr: Memleketime Döndüğümde Çocukluk Arkadaşım Paramparça Bir Durumdaydı

description.en:
When I was younger, one of my best friends was Kyouko. She was a brash and hotheaded young girl who, even though she was a tomboy, was still loved by her peers. 

To be honest, it’s been a few years since I came back home. The only person I know from there was Kyouko and she seems… different?
description.tr: Gençken en iyi arkadaşlarımdan biri Kyouko'ydu. Cesur ve atılgan bir genç kızdı; tomboy olmasına rağmen, arkadaşları tarafından seviliyordu. Dürüst olmak gerekirse, birkaç yıl sonra eve anca döndüm. Orada tanıdığım tek kişi Kyouko'ydu ve o sanki... biraz değişmişti?
description.pt-br:
Quando eu era mais jovem, uma das minhas melhores amigas era Kyouko. Ela era uma jovem impetuosa e cabeça quente que, embora fosse uma tomboy, ainda era amada por seus colegas.

Para ser sincero, já se passaram alguns anos desde que voltei para casa. A única pessoa que conheço de lá é Kyouko e ela parece... diferente?

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

On the day of the Wizarding City Paz's destruction, Amina got stuck inside a lamp while trying to turn back time. And 300 years later, she was awakened by a military commander, Jakal.

“I do not have any wishes for you to grant.”
Well, I just want to hurry and grant a wish so I can go back, who the hell is this guy?
  
“Do you know who I am?”
“There is no one else in this world who knows you better than I do.”
“That’s not possible… I’ll disappear one of these days!”

Amina, who needs to go back into the lamp after granted the wishes suddenly meets Jakal who wants to give up his wishes to be with her. However, there are many dangers and threats that prevent him from doing so. Will Amina achieve her wish in the end?

---
Official Translations:
* [Simplified Chinese](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28238)
* [Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=2059)
* [Indonesian](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Lampu-Ajaib-Amina/3355)
* [German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=3262)
* [Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1870)
description.pl:
Co możesz zrobić z trzema życzeniami?

Amina, jedna z ostatnich magików, utraciła wszystkich, których kochała podczas ataku na pałac. Próbując cofnąć się w czasie, aby ich ocalić, utknęła w lampie.

300 lat później pułkownik Jakal obudził ją.

Ma tylko trzy życzenia nim Amina wróci do lampy.

Czego sobie zażyczy?

description.en: Every day Sakuta Gotou likes to zone out to his favorite band the Incest, because it makes him feel at ease. However, this band is very secretive and has yet to have a live performance. Now, when the chance comes to Gotou to see his idol Iive, the band's singer, on stage, he finds out that she is the new transfer student in the classroom next door… and to make this even better she stops the concert and grabs him saying, "I've wanted to see you." What is he going to do now?
A manga about the story of a 38-year-old salaryman named Kirin who is also a street racer.

William (who calls himself Wiwi in his head) is not your typical English teacher. The reason? He tends to be even less mature than his students. He’s headstrong, a tad bit vindictive and a rascal. Come along and discover how this teacher survives being surrounded by students with strange questions, colleagues who are just as crazy as he is, management who keeps him under close surveillance, and shoddy equipment that is ready to break down at any moment. In this Webtoon you’ll get to stand on the other side of the desk and discover the secrets of the classroom!
description.fr: William (qui s'appelle « Wiwi » dans sa tête) est un professeur d'anglais un peu atypique, puisqu'il a la particularité d'être moins mature que ses élèves. Tête en l'air, fainéant, quelque peu roublard, et un tantinet revanchard : découvrez comment ce prof survit en milieu scolaire, entourés d'élèves aux questions étranges, de collègues tout aussi bizarres que lui, d'une hiérarchie qui le surveille de près, et de matériel prêt à tomber en panne à tout moment. Avec ces webtoons, vous passerez de l'autre côté du bureau et découvrirez les secrets de la salle des profs !

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amou, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amou sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?

title.en: There Is No Forgiveness From the Regressed Lady

description.en:
Cassia, stripped of everything by her brother's lover and best friend, resolves to rewrite her twisted fate by traveling back in time. Her first objective: prevent her brother and the villainess from ever falling in love. Yet, she quickly discovers that altering human emotions, even with the ability to manipulate time, proves impossible.
In a moment of despair, a hero from the North emerges – Cain, the emperor's half-brother and a grand duke condemned to die for treason. Upon meeting him, Cassia instinctively understands: this man holds the key to reshaping her destiny, mirroring her own past struggles.
Now, Cassia must navigate the intricate threads of fate and love, with Cain at her side, to reclaim what was taken from her and forge a new path forward against all odds.
description.ko:
오빠의 연인이자 절친에게 모든 걸 빼앗긴 '카시아'.
과거로 돌아가 잘못된 운명을 만회하고자 한다. 

그렇게 세운 첫 번째 목표는 바로
오빠와 악녀의 연애를 막는 것!

하지만 회귀자조차도 바꿀 수 없던 것이 사람의 감정이었으니…

좌절의 순간,
그녀 앞에 북방의 영웅이 나타난다.

현 황제의 이복동생이자
반역죄로 몰려 처형당할 대공 '카인'.

과거에 자신과 같은 말로를 맞이한 요주의 인물을 보며,
그녀는 본능적으로 직감한다.

이 사람이 바로 운명을 바꿀 열쇠라는 것을.

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

description.en: A young girl named Fu, travels into the past to make sure that her parents don't get together...

altTitles.zh: 大上同学和可露贝洛苏！

description.en: When Oogami-san was confessed to by one of the three dog eared girls Cer Ber and Us they became friends and started hanging out together. Will this friendship eventually turn into love!? A love story between the three physically identical girls who have totally different personalities and the beautiful lone wolf.
A cute rice ball team explains poetry in 4 panel comics.

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！
